data.content:
noun
plural plaids
[noncount] :a pattern on cloth of stripes with different widths that cross each other to form squares - often used before another noun
a plaid pattern
a plaid shirt
see color picture
plaids [plural] US :clothes with plaid patterns
She likes to wear plaids.
[count] :a woolen cloth with a plaid pattern that is worn over the shoulder as part of the Scottish national costume
